Class InventoryManager<T extends SalableProduct>

java.lang.Object
arenaShop.InventoryManager<T>
public class InventoryManager<T extends SalableProduct> extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InventoryManager(SalableProductFactoryInterface<T> productFactory)
    Utilizes the JSON file to populate the inventory with products

      Throws:

    • getAllInventory

      public ArrayList<T> getAllInventory()

      inventory List of all products

    • setInventory

      public ArrayList<T> getAvailableInventory()
      Allows game users to view available products for purchase
      Returns:
      availableInventory

    • updateInventory

      public void updateInventory(ArrayList<T> products, String command, int item)
      Updates the inventory by removing or adding the correct quantity of a specified product
      Parameters:
      products - All products in the inventory
      command - Internal command that executes the correct logic in this method
      item - Order of a product within the inventory
